# The `LoopBlocksDFS` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Store the result of a depth first search within basic blocks contained by a single loop. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::LoopBlocksDFS</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Store the result of a depth first search within basic blocks contained by a single loop.

TODO: This could be generalized for any CFG region, or the entire CFG.

Definition at line 97 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopiterator-h">LoopIterator.h</a>.

### perform() {#adc85a5f08fb0f5dc3e053975995c9d29}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LoopBlocksDFS::perform (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42; LI)</>}>
Traverse the loop blocks and store the DFS result.

Useful for clients that just want the final DFS result and don&#39;t need to visit blocks during the initial traversal.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopiterator-h/#l00123">123</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopiterator-h">LoopIterator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#l01266">1266</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp">LoopInfo.cpp</a>.

### PostNumbers {#a2bda234235673011d7e4ba2a92409add}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;BasicBlock&#42;, unsigned&gt; llvm::LoopBlocksDFS::PostNumbers</>}>
Map each block to its postorder number.

A block is only mapped after it is preorder visited by DFS. It&#39;s postorder number is initially zero and set to nonzero after it is finished by postorder traversal.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopiterator-h/#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopiterator-h">LoopIterator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
